snippet: Venus Williams eased past the Croatian qualifier Petra Martic to line up a second-round match with the former Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova in the Qatar Open.
abstract: Venus Williams eased past the Croatian qualifier Petra Martic to line up a second-round match with the former Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova in the Qatar Open.
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams eased past the Croatian qualifier Petra Martic to line up a second-round match with the former Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova in the Qatar Open.
